name: Impact Velocity
description:
Impact Velocity

A fully Newtonian top-down shooter, with a hard sci-fi bent. Set in a universe inspired by the likes of Robert A. Heinlein, David Weber, and James S.A. Corey.

Please leave a comment, and tell us what you think of Impact Velocity.

Credits:

Music - Joseph Bergstrom

Sound - Joseph Bergstrom

Art - Joseph Bergstrom, Joshua Wolff

Design - Joseph Bergstrom, Joshua Wolff

Programming - Joseph Bergstrom

Minimum System Requirements:

We're pretty sure a toaster could run it, but please feel free to tell us if you have a toaster that can't.
